Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Nice location, friendly staff. We ordered a "dirty harry" burger and a Philly steak sandwich, both were very good. The acoustics were not perfect and the chatter noise from just 2 tables was loud, but maybe it's just my sensitivity to the noise

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Very good small restaurant to have dinner and drink. The waitress was really friendly and we had a good time there!

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Staff were really friendly and food was lovely. The area is nice and quite a lot going on. I would recommend if you are nearby.

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: loved the sweet potato fries, together with that mayo it tastes like royalty.

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Good food for a quick and decent meal. Fair prices.

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: I found this place as I was walking past it and I went in and instantly felt a sense of home-comfort. The style is impeccable and clean as well. I go there often and it never disappoints. Food like the chicken wings are delicious with a ‚Ä¶

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Very friendly staff, small menu but with a great selection. Burgers, hot dogs, ribs, steak, and all the trimmings. The food is great, full of flavour and clearly made with the freshest & best ingredients available. Service is informative, fast, courteous, and entertaining. Would definitely return!

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Quite nice, seems like high quality American style comfort food.  Sure would love some good mac & cheese on the menu. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Sloppy Joe is amazing! The food and beer was fantastic, but the service even more so. We were a large group and arrived without reservation. They went out of their way to accommodate and feed all of us. Would recommend!

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Well worth it! Nice concept - mostly charcoal oven baked. Chicken basket, sweet potato fries and unique chicken hot dogs were awesome. Unpretentious new startup! Update: BEST CHICKEN IN AMSTERDAM! And some decent craft bottled beer

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: We visited Sloppy Joe based on good reviews. Unfortunately it was not the taste I expected. Sloppy Joe burger is not a classical meat ball, sauted minced meat. Some may find it interesting, tasty but I still prefer burger.

Name: Sloppy Joe
Review Text: Really tasty, would highly recommend the burger really tasty joicy, and the pommis was really good as well, staff kind helpful. ‚Ä¶
